name: onshore_petroleum_v12
title: On-Shore Petroleum
description: The petroleum dataset contains information on all known on-shore oil and gas deposits throughout the world. Data is binary indicating locations with deposits

extract_types_info.count: total count of pixels per unit of analysis
extract_types_info.sum: number of pixels containing on-shore petroleum deposits for each unit of analysis

extras.citation: Lujala, Päivi; Jan Ketil Rød & Nadia Thieme, 2007. ‘Fighting over Oil: Introducing A New Dataset’, Conflict Management and Peace Science 24(3), 239-256.
